org.jasig.cas.support.events.dao

Interface CasEventRepository

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractCasEventRepository, JpaCasEventRepository, MongoDbCasEventRepository

    public interface CasEventRepository
    Defines DAO operations over an events repository.

    5.0.0
